main event: Mrs. Dotty Hassell reported observing three bright, metallic-appearing objects in the sky at approximately 9:50 PM on 11 May 66.
interesting points: The objects were described as the size of the moon, very bright, but not as bright as the stars., The objects hovered in the sky before suddenly accelerating and disappearing from sight., The sighting lasted for about 15 seconds., The event occurred over the course of three weeks with similar observations noted., Mrs. Hassell was quite shaken by the experience and had never seen anything like it before.
witness description: Mrs. Dotty Hassell, who reported being quite shaken by the experience.
